name: Nina Ka
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients needing consulting or business development support. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with aligned coaches, consultants, or entrepreneurs.
what_you_do: Pinnacle Group's Founder, Chairman, and Chief Executive Officer. Her dynamic leadership over the past 22 years has propelled the company from a niche IT services firm to the workforce solutions powerhouse it is today, providing industry-leading workforce solutions and high-end IT services to iconic global brands.
social_proof: Pinnacle Group has been named to the Inc. 500/5000 list of fastest-growing companies for more than a decade and is consistently named among the nation's fastest-growing women-owned companies by the Women Presidents' Organization. Vaca has been featured in numerous publications and is a sought-after speaker and thought leader worldwide. She has won numerous awards both for Pinnacle Group and as an individual. Vaca has also been named one of the most influential Latinos in the United States for the past ten years and has been called one of the country's 100 most intriguing entrepreneurs by Goldman Sachs.
business_focus: Pinnacle Group provides industry-leading workforce solutions and high-end IT services to iconic global brands.
